name: Beetroot & Ricotta Quinoa Salad Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Preheat oven to 200Â°C. Place beetroot onto a lined tray and spray with oil. Season and roast for 30 minutes or until tender.

Meanwhile, place quinoa and 4 cups of water in a saucepan over high heat. Cover. Bring to the boil. Reduce heat to low and simmer for 10-12 minutes or until water has been absorbed. Meanwhile, blanch broccoli in boiling water for a few minutes or until tender. Drain.
Combine beetroot, quinoa, broccoli, ricotta, almonds and rind in a bowl. Whisk oil, 1/3 cup lemon juice, salt and pepper in a jug. Add to salad and toss through. Serve.
